column2: Budgets aren’t very sexy, but you’ve already identified how crucial they are to knowing if your retirement will be secure. Is there any wiggle room should an emergency arise so that you don’t need to tap into your bank account or withdraw even more from your retirement accounts? You didn’t specify if that $15,600 annual insurance covers car, home and health but make sure you have all three.
column4: We are in our late 50s and have retired with less than $1 million: ‘Did I jump the gun?’
